article_title: The doctors training to save lives in Gaza
sentence: More  than  26,700  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  by  the  conflict  triggered  by  the  7  October  Hamas  attack,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: The doctors training to save lives in Gaza
sentence: The  doctor  said  he  knew  of  colleagues  who  went  to  Gaza  and  were  killed  helping  others.
